name: GameDev-Midterm-SpaceTravel
description:
Music Credit:

https://freesound.org/people/aptbr/sounds/203932/

https://freesound.org/people/holizna/sounds/629153/

(Sincerely Apologize I cannot find the sfx source anymore, yet both are also from FreeSound.org)

I am intended to develop a solid platformer for Midterm, and I think I basically made it -- more complicated map, checkpoint, spikes, life and score count.

Turning floaty physics (which correspond with the setting) is hard. I am actually still not very satisfied of what it is now, but definitely better than prototype.

For visual, I mostly just made it more polished, like more detailed MC sprites, more difference between platform and background, more sprites, etc.

For audio...I am actually not a huge fan of lofi. Yet somehow, I was listening to lofi almost the entire time I was working on it, so I thought "why not I just go that direction". So here it is
